td.content: s:pt presents w/ c/o 2 weeks h/o moderate loss of appetite, severe right shoulder pain, critical posterior thoracic pain on respiration and Cancer. patient is a white M aged 50 Ys. denies any smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 192 cm, Weight 85.6 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 17, Contrast-enhanced CT Chest 4.6 x 5.1 x 4.6 cm mass in the aortopulmonary window encasing the left pulmonary artery, a 1.9-cm subcarinal lymph node, and a mass in the left upper lobe of the lung measuring 2.5 x 2.1 cm with suspicious regional lymphangitic spread, Contrast-enhanced MRI brain shows 2 enhancing cerebral metastases of lung cancer in the left cerebral hemisphere a:Lung Cancer p:administered cisplatin - 60 mg/m2 3 times per month, irinotecan - 60 mg/m2 3 times per month, performed Contrast-enhanced CT Chest, Contrast-enhanced MRI brain, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
